meanings.definition: superlative form of zooty, meaning extremely stylish or fashionable
meanings.sent1: She wore the zootiest dress to the party, turning heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured the zootiest designs of the season.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat thought it looked zootiest in its tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was as zootiest as her outfit, shining brightly in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The zootiest outfit at the event was a shimmering gown that stole the spotlight.

meanings.definition: in a manner that is the most stylish or fashionable
meanings.sent1: She walked zootiest down the runway, captivating the audience with every step.
meanings.sent2: The models strutted confidently and zootiest during the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled zootiest in its tuxedo, looking surprisingly dapper.
meanings.sent4: The music played zootiest, setting the perfect tone for the glamorous event.
meanings.sent5: The designer dressed the mannequin zootiest to showcase the latest collection.

meanings.definition: the most stylish or fashionable person or thing
meanings.sent1: She was known as the zootiest in town, always setting new trends.
meanings.sent2: The boutique displayed the zootiest items in its window display.
meanings.sent3: The peacock proudly strutted around, claiming to be the zootiest bird in the park.
meanings.sent4: The classic car stood out as the zootiest vehicle at the vintage car show.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity was hailed as the zootiest of them all, gracing magazine covers regularly.
